Dialogues:
Ruth#Such a beautiful place. I wonder
what goes on beyond this wall.

Ruth#Louise claimed she would sometimes hear
someone sing from over here when we
were young, but I never heard anything.

Ruth#Maybe I'll be allowed to pass beyond
some day. I could sing too, I think.
If I stood on those beautiful flowers
I'm sure that I could sing.

Ruth#I guess the forest just has to
get to know me a bit better.
